books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A novel set in the Jazz Age that explores themes of wealth, love, and the American Dream.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A Pulitzer Prize-winning novel about racial injustice and childhood innocence in the American South.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A chilling prophecy about a totalitarian future ruled by surveillance and censorship.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.description: A rebellious teenager narrates his experiences as he struggles with society and adulthood.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: A classic fantasy adventure of Bilbo Baggins on his quest to reclaim treasure from a dragon.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A timeless romance novel about love, class, and misunderstandings in 19th-century England.

books.title: Moby-Dick
books.author: Herman Melville
books.description: A thrilling tale of obsession and revenge between a whaler and a giant white whale.

books.title: The Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.description: A philosophical novel about a shepherd’s journey to find his personal legend.

books.title: War and Peace
books.author: Leo Tolstoy
books.description: A grand historical novel covering Napoleon’s invasion of Russia and its impact on society.

books.title: Harry Potter
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: The first book in the magical Harry Potter series, following the young wizard’s adventures.

books.title: Jane Eyre
books.author: Charlotte Brontë
books.description: An orphaned governess overcomes hardships to find love and independence.

books.title: Crime and Punishment
books.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
books.description: A psychological exploration of guilt and redemption following a young man's crime.

books.title: A Promised Land
books.author: Barack Obama
books.description: A memoir by Barack Obama, covering his early political career through key moments in his presidency.

books.title: Think Like a Monk
books.author: Jay Shetty
books.description: A self-help book that shares wisdom from Jay Shetty’s time as a monk, offering practical life lessons.
